cab.content: Sir G. Buchanan (Petrograd). 10th July 1917.D* 9.26 p.me 10thR.8 a.m..l3thJuly 1917ilo. 1061. Following from Henderson for Prime Minister, Minister for Foreign Affairs called to see rae yesterday previous to departure for the front to confer with Minister of War. He urged that date and place of oonferenoe of Allied Governments including America should;.he speedily:- fixed. He suggests London between September 1st and September 15th and proposes coming himself and hones to be; accompanied by Minister of War. It wo uld be helpful here;if it could be announced that arisageraents for conference were going;on satisfactorily.
